attributes.action: approve the proposed Kingsnorth Power Station in Kent providing it only starts up with CCS.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We need plus power in the UK but we also need to curb GHGs to slow climate change.  Therefore we should progress the proposed coal station providing it starts up with CCS (Carbon Capture & Storage).  Renewables are not continuous and can only provide a small % of the load, so that until large scale power storage is developed nuclear and coal with CCS will be required.
